voluminous, so we don't know which document that is (we're not tracking the unsealed documents).

Thanks,

Inquiry: 
> Hello, I'm a journalist with the Daily mail and am looking to find out if you have any comment on the claim in 
newly unsealed court documents that Prince Andrew and Alan Dershowitz put pressure on the DOJ togive 
Jeffre0Epstein a favorable plea deal in 2007. The documents were unsealed in a civil case brought b 
an Epstein victim, against Ghislaine Maxwell, his alleged madam. Please email or call me on 
EFTA00031216
